about_the_game:
《League of Immortals》 is a large-scale multi-user role-playing game (MMORPG). The game is based on the fantasy fairy and ancient myths and legends as the background, in this fantasy world, the player through the completion of the task experience, to eliminate the devil adventure, to enhance the level and realm, to obtain more powerful strength, and at the same time in the process of adventure can make friends to know like-minded partners, the formation of guilds, to participate in the guild battle, guild BOSS and other activities.
Players in the game can also be very good for social interaction, in addition to chatting with friends, PK sparring martial arts, when you get the best equipment or materials can also be traded or sold, etc., at the same time the game has a lot of generous rewards for players to participate in activities, such as players kill monsters have the probability of triggering the encounter to enter the mysterious realm of fantasy, beat the BOSS to get the mysterious prize. The game also has a variety of cool fashions and titles, highlighting the character's personality and charm, in addition to a variety of props and currencies, players can obtain these items in different ways, so that the items, currencies and enhance their own strength to form a positive cycle, this is a network online game full of fantasy color and challenging.

The game has a large number of fashion and equipment, not only has a cool and cool appearance, but also can greatly enhance the attributes, so forging to enhance the special equipment, kill the BOSS, is the main goal of players.
